original_text: From the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven has suffered violence, and the violent take it by force.
korean_text: 세례 요한의 때부터 지금까지 천국은 침노를 당하나니 침노하는 자는 빼앗느니라

sentences.original_text: From the days of John the Baptist until now
the kingdom of heaven has suffered violence
the violent take it by force
